publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6876 Linda Fabiani: East Kilbride Wins Again—That the Parliament congratulates Controlled Therapeutics (Scotland) Ltd (CTS Ltd) of East Kilbride on winning, for the second time, the prestigious Queen’s Award for Enterprise, the 2010 Award being in the International Trade category for their product, Propess/Cervidil, which has become the leading brand for induction of labour in the United States of America and the European Union; praises the commitment and dedication of all staff as recognised by the company at their celebration on 25 August; recognises that Lanarkshire is home to many innovative and successful companies, and looks forward to further success for CTS Ltd, East Kilbride, for its innovative work on the development of specialist products that address unmet clinical needs in women’s health.
